context: Could you recommend a film by Chris Wedge? I don't share the same taste in films with my son and would like an unbiased opinion.
Sure! What is your son's favorite film starring Chris Wedge? He did star in Ice Age. It is a family film and an animation.
He loves the film Robots but I didn't find it all that great. I do love the Ice Age films, however. I can never remember some of the voice actors from it. Can you give me some help?
resp: Jane Krakowski was one of them. Cedric the Entertainer lent his voice too. If you enjoy watching animation, adventure and a little bit comedy, you will love Ice Age.
